  • Method Details

    • multiply

      public static String multiply(String num1, String num2)
      This method first checks if the parameters are valid and then calls the karatsuba() method, which returns the result of multiplication of the two numbers. The type of parameters as well as the return type is String.
      Parameters:
      num1 - number 1 to be multiplied by the number 2
      num2 - number 2 to multiply the number 2
      Returns:
      the result of multiplication of the two numbers

    • karatsuba

      public static String karatsuba(String num1, String num2)
      Recursive method that takes two integer numbers (any number of digits) and returns the product of their multiplication. It uses Karatsuba algorithm, which is more effective than classic multiplication (multiplying each digit of one number with every number of other number) that has time complexity O(nˆ2). This algorithm uses an approach named divide and conquer, which makes this algorithm more effective and shrinks the time complexity of multiplication down to O(nˆ(log 3))
      Parameters:
      num1 - 1st number, to be multiplied by 2nd
      num2 - 2nd number, to be multiplied by 1st
      Returns:
      the multiplication of the two parameters

    • chunkify

      public static String chunkify(String larger, String smaller)
      This method is executed if there there is a multiplication of two number with different number of digits. It splits the larger number into n/m chunks, each with m digits. Then the smaller number is multiplied by each chunk using Karatsuba’s algorithm, and then the resulting partial products are summed with appropriate shifts.
      Parameters:
      larger - number with larger number of digits
      smaller - number with smaller number of digits
      Returns:
      the result of multiplication of the two numbers

    • sumTwoNums

      public static String sumTwoNums(String num1, String num2)
      This method sums two (positive) numbers. These are passed as Strings, which is also the return type.
      Parameters:
      num1 - first addent
      num2 - second addent
      Returns:
      sum of the parameters

    • diffTwoNums

      public static String diffTwoNums(String num1, String num2)
      This method returns the num1 subtracted by num2. These numbers are passed as Strings, which is also the return type.
      Parameters:
      num1 - minuend
      num2 - subtrahend
      Returns:
      difference
